Slugslinger looked on anxiously at Tremor. He wanted to desperatly
follow, to a safer place, he tried to follow, but he couldnt follow. He
couldnt transform to save his life, when he then felt a searing pain in
his main structure that told him that his thoughts were becoming true.
He looked on, as Grimlock poured the heat on, beginning to melt his
frame, and he screamed loudly, his pain filled voice echoing over the
mountain range, animals scattering from the unpleasant noise.

Caliburst looked back from the back of Tremor, "Slugslinger" he
whispered, worried for his partner's condition. All he could hear was
Apeface's reply.

"Understood." it told Tremor.
